subject: Football
Wages and Salaries
lead_paragraph: The Indianapolis Colts signed Andrew Luck, the Stanford quarterback and No. 1 overall pick in the N.F.L. draft, to a four-year, $22.1 million deal.
snippet: The Indianapolis Colts signed Andrew Luck, the Stanford quarterback and No. 1 overall pick in the N.F.L. draft, to a four-year, $22.1 million deal.
